posts.content:
A cool patina'd 66 kombi in excellent solid condition. Original sills, jack points, outriggers, arches etc etc. No roof rust.. There were a few pin holes and some heavy pitting on the cab floor outer edges so we have cut these out and flush welded in top quality floor repair panels so it looks very close to factory.

1500cc motor that have been upgreded from 6 volt electrics to a 12 volt alternator, rebuild kingpins, renewed brakes, new original style front seatbelts, 5 new tyres, new windscreens and seals etc.

Supplied with full MOT, tax and UK reg

£10,995.00

Are the airscoops welded to this van or can they be unbolted. Also have you any pictures of the underside of the van and the interior.

I'm very interested.

Sorry for the non van sale question but did you supply those rear tires in the picture or are they the ones it arrived with?
be cracking if you could let me know what they are

Also ppppppppppppppppplease stop getting cool vans in! get tempted to see if you'll do a deal on mine all the time
